item.description:
Dear Portuguese Language Speakers,

This event is a wonderful fundraiser for the Cambridge and Somerville Portuguese Language School

(http://www.escolaportuguesadecambridgeesomerville.org/). 

This event includes a full Portuguese dinner with wine and traditional Portuguese Fado music performed by three singers and two "guitarristas".

Tickets are $45 per adult and $15 per child (ages 5 - 12).

Food is ordered and tables are set-up in advance according to paid in advance reservations. Last minute reservations will not be possible.

This event will take place in the Great Hall of Saint Anthony Parish Church. There will plenty of parking.

I am definitely attending this event. If you would like to attend this event, please call 617-388-3457 to pay and make your reservation. At the time of the reservation, please tell them that you are with me, Joana.

After you pay for your tickets, please send me your full name and the names of any others in your party so I can confirm the final group seating arrangements.

I look forward in enjoying Portuguese dinner and Fado music with you,

 

Joana

For location details, http://www.stanthony-cambridge.com/
item.how_to_find_us: A table will be reserved for our Group

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Fado Music and Dinner Fundraiser
